title: Liberal

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a gender, or make a new one. If you make a gender not listed below, you gain the effects of a random town support role.
- Choosing male gives you a new ability: At night choose to drink beer or wrestle. Drinking beer roleblocks yourself. Wrestling a target roleblocks them.
- Choosing female gives you a new ability: At night you can choose to girlboss up to 3 times. If you girlboss, you shoot all your visitors with a basic attack. If you kill a townie, you can't girlboss anymore.
- Choosing non-binary gives you a new ability: At night you can talk to the dead. If you are dead and your gender was non-binary, you may seance a living player and send them one message.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After choosing a gender, you can choose to change your gender again.
- After choosing or changing your gender, you have to wait a night as you transition. After transitioning you gain access to your abilities.
